entities.name: aunt marge
entities.description: Aunt Marge bumped her large jaw against Aunt Petunia's bony cheekbone. She is described as having a large jaw and being jovial.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia has a bony cheekbone and hates animals. She wincs slightly when Ripper drools on her floor.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is described as smiling jovially and asking about tea for Aunt Marge. He also asks who is looking after the other dogs.

entities.name: ripper
entities.description: Ripper is an animal that lapping noisily in the corner and drools on Aunt Petunia's floor. He is given tea out of Aunt Marge's saucer.

entities.name: colonel fubster
entities.description: Colonel Fubster is a retired person who is managing the other dogs for Aunt Marge.

relationships.description: Aunt Marge has Colonel Fubster managing the other dogs for her.
Uncle Vernon asks Aunt Marge about tea and who is looking after the other dogs.
